questions.question: The nonces are primarily used in the request and response messages. What is the purpose of these nonces?
Which of the following statements describes a replay attack?

answers.a: An attacker modifies the contents of a legitimate message in transit.
answers.b: An attacker eavesdrops on communication to steal sensitive data.
answers.c: An attacker intercepts a message and retransmits it multiple times.
answers.d: An attacker sends a fake message to a legitimate user

questions.question: What is the main objective of combining passive?

answers.a: To make the attack more detectable
answers.b: To boost the attacker's chances of success
answers.c: To shorten the attack’s preparation period
answers.d: reducing the victim’s exposure to the attack’s effects
